ValidationRule.description:
Single Regular User and Light User shouldn't be used as the tier-priced and the batch User products were introduced.
BODEV-3830: the tier-priced Regular User products deprecated, thus single Regular User can be added.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
/* BODEV-3830: single Regular User is exempted from the validation. It can be added to New Biz Opps. */
AND( NOT($Profile.Name = "System Administrator"), ISNEW(), ISPICKVAL(Opportunity.Type,'New Business-Enterprise Cloud'), Product2.Product_ID_18_digits__c='01t0P000002EFL9QAO', /* Light User */ NOT(Part_of_a_package__c) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Light User Product cannot be added as a product to New Business or Upsell opportunities. Please use the batch Light User Products.
